casebody.data:
STATE
v.
IRELAND 2017-0344 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 21, 2018 O'DONNELL, FRENCH, and FISCHER, JJ., concur. KENNEDY and DEWINE, JJ., dissent.

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISION

On appellee's motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. Appellee's motion to dismiss by virtue of abatement denied. Appellant's motion to substitute a party defendant-appellee granted.

O'CONNOR, C.J., and DEGENARO, J., concur. The court's decision in this case was limited to a reversal of the court of appeals' judgment and a remand to the court of appeals solely for consideration of the four remaining assignments of error.
